title: Bedwina Bouncy Balls in Bulk - Pack of 250 (1inch/27mm) Hi Bounce Ball Variety Assortment Mix, Colourful and Small Rubber Bouncy Balls for Game Prizes, Party Bag Fillers for Kids, Kids' Party Favours
features: BULK PACK OF 250 BOUNCY BALLS FOR KIDS PARTY BAGS: Each bulk pack of 250 bouncing balls features a wide variety of different colours and styles. Some styles include; tie-dyed, footballs, pool cues, rainbow, icy clear, swirls, and more. These small bouncy balls measure 1 Inch in diameter (27mm) and are VERY bouncy

MEGA VARIETY ASSORTMENT: You will be thrilled that you found this bulk set of kids bouncy balls at such a fantastic price! Because this assorted variety of bouncy balls offers so many colours and styles it makes a great impulse item for kids and adults. They are fun to play with and worry-free, when one gets lost, just grab another one

HIGH QUALITY & SUPER BOUNCY: These small bouncy balls are made of quality rubber and bounce off almost any surface inside or outside. They bounce off the tile, wood floors, pavement, bricks, dogs, cats, you name it! They arrive in a sealed poly bag. Use caution opening the bag otherwise, balls come bouncing out all over the place

GREAT KIDS PARTY BAG FILLERS OR FOR VENDING MACHINES: Who wouldn't want to have 250 rubber bouncy balls for endless fun!? Surprise your children or grandchildren with these bouncy balls, use them at birthday parties as party favours, in vending machines, game prizes, classroom treasure boxes, as a non-candy alternative at Halloween, and more

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: When looking for bouncy balls for children as goody bag fillers for kids with Bedwina you can be rest assured that if for whatever reason you are not 100% satisfied, we'll take back your product, no questions asked. We are here to make you 100% happy and provide the best customer service to our customers
Warning: CHOKING HAZARD -- Small parts. Not for children under 3 yrs.
description: Bouncy Ball Mega Variety Pack in Bulk - 250 (1"/27mm) Hi Bouncing Balls This pack of Bedwina bouncy balls include a total of 250 small balls in a wide variety of different colours and styles. Some styles include; tie-dyed, footballs, pool cues, rainbow, icy clear, swirls, and more. These small bouncy balls measure 1 Inch in diameter (27mm) and are very bouncy and fun! Huge Assorted Variety of Styles and Colours You will be thrilled that you found this bulk set at such a fantastic price! Because this assorted variety of bouncy balls offers so many colours and styles it makes a great impulse item for kids, and adults. Surprise your kid's or grandkids with these bouncy balls, use them as birthday party bags fillers, in vending machines, game prizes, prize box fillers for teachers, treasure boxes, as a non-candy alternative at Halloween and more. They are fun play with and worry-free, when one gets lost, just grab another one! KEY FEATURES: -Bulk Pack of 250 Bouncy Balls -Variety of Colours and Designs -Bounces High off Many Surfaces -Great for Party Favor Gifts and Vending Machines -Diameter Measures 1-Inch(27mm) -High Quality -Ages 3+ Warning This is a choking hazard and it's not for kids Under 3
